explains: n. 聚集，聚合；（互联网）相关内容项的集合；聚集体，集合体
wordGroup: aggregation effect 聚集效应；团聚效应
aggregation function 加总函数；集合函数
state of aggregation 聚集状态；聚集态

sentences.en: The very nature of the initial slash-and-burn agriculture encouraged a further dependence on agriculture and the aggregation of people into denser settlements.
sentences.cn: 最初的刀耕火种式农业的本质鼓励人们进一步依赖农业，并促使人们聚集到人口更密集的居住区。

sentences.en: But this distinction misses the point that it is processing and aggregation, not the mere possession of bits, that gives the data value.
sentences.cn: 但这种区别忽略了一点，即正是对信息的处理和收集，而不是仅仅拥有信息，让数据有了价值。

sentences.en: Etherchannel is a port link aggregation technology.
sentences.cn: 以太信道是一种端口链路聚合技术。
